verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> unto me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>beast:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is mine.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> ye came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> out of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H5650>bondage;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>this<s%> <S%H2088><s%> place: there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
This <S%H3117>day<s%> came ye <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H859><s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thee <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee, a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> that thou shalt <S%H5647>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> be <S%H7200>seen<s%> with thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there be <S%H7603>leaven<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> with thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1366>quarters.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5046>show<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> This is done <S%H5668>because<s%> of <S%H2088>that<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto me when I came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H226>sign<s%> unto thee <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> may <S%H1961>be<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought thee <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4714><s%>
Thou shalt therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> in his <S%H4150>season<s%> from <S%H4480>year<s%> <S%H3117><s%> to <S%H3117>year.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thee <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thee and to thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it thee,

That thou shalt set <S%H5674>apart<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6363>firstling<s%> that <S%H7698>cometh<s%> of a <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H1961>hast;<s%> the <S%H2145>males<s%> shall be the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6363>firstling<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass<s%> thou shalt <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%> it, then thou shalt break his <S%H6202>neck:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> among thy <S%H1121>children<s%> shalt thou <S%H6299>redeem.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asketh<s%> thee in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2063>this?<s%> that thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, By <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of bondage: <S%H5650><s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> would <S%H7185>hardly<s%> let us <S%H7971>go,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both the <S%H4480>firstborn<s%> <S%H1060><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>beast:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix,<s%> being <S%H2145>males;<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of my <S%H1121>children<s%> I <S%H6299>redeem.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H226>token<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and for <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5148>led<s%> them <S%H3808>not<s%> through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H3588>although<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> was <S%H7138>near;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Lest <S%H6435>peradventure<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>repent<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4421>war,<s%> and they <S%H7725>return<s%> to Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> led the people <S%H5437>about,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H2571>harnessed<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him: <S%H3588>for<s%> he had straitly <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H7650><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will surely <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H6485><s%> you; and ye shall carry up my bones <S%H5927>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H4480>hence<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you.
And they took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H4480>Succoth,<s%> <S%H5523><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H864>Etham,<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them by <S%H3119>day<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> to <S%H5148>lead<s%> them the <S%H1870>way;<s%> and by <S%H3915>night<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> to give them <S%H215>light;<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> and night: <S%H3915><s%>

He took not <S%H4185>away<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> nor the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
